alert.note: Alert for Haralson; Polk (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 4:34PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Haralson and southwestern Polk Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 434 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Felton, or near Buchanan, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Buchanan, Fish Creek, Felton, Antioch and Eubank Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
